task_completion.consensus_explanation: The agents did not reach a consensus on any of the negotiation points. The conversation log shows only repeated statements of intent to negotiate, without any actual negotiation or proposal exchanges.

Valuation Agreement.explanation: No pre-money valuation was agreed upon.

task_completion.summary: The negotiation failed completely. The agents only stated their intention to negotiate without making any proposals or engaging in meaningful discussion. No consensus was reached on any of the key points, and no term sheet was generated.
